name: part_008
file: tmp_【#尾丸ポルカ一周年】エッ！？1時間でガチの即興曲を！？いい話もあるよ！【3DLIVE】 [as7iNw5gSi8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Omaru Polka performs the song 'BLUE CLAPPER' on a 3D stage.
MC section where Polka thanks the audience and reflects on the solo performance.
Polka and Zain-kun begin the improvised composition of the '1st Anniversary Song'.

subtitles.original: Oh yeah!
subtitles.english: Oh yeah!

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hi! Hi! Hi! Hi!

subtitles.original: いっぱい手拍子してください！
subtitles.english: Please clap your hands a lot!

subtitles.original: 今日はいらない Breaky 微成功はステキ
subtitles.english: Don't need a breaky today, micro-success is lovely

subtitles.original: 何時でも一緒 24時中
subtitles.english: Any time together, 24 hours a day

subtitles.original: 君は何をミリ？ 解き放て Sparking！
subtitles.english: What are you looking at? Unleash the sparking!

subtitles.original: 暗闇に放つ Laser Beam
subtitles.english: A laser beam released into the darkness

subtitles.original: 光らせて Stage 作るから
subtitles.english: I'll make the stage shine

subtitles.original: なぁ 君にもっと見てほしいから
subtitles.english: Hey, because I want you to see more

subtitles.original: 手をあげて Clap Your Hands！ 海の向こうまで
subtitles.english: Raise your hands and Clap Your Hands! To the other side of the sea

subtitles.original: Clap Your Hands！ 届きますように
subtitles.english: Clap Your Hands! May it reach you

subtitles.original: 手を叩こう！ 手を叩こう！
subtitles.english: Let's clap our hands! Let's clap our hands!

subtitles.original: ほら一緒に Go！
subtitles.english: Come on, let's go together!

subtitles.original: Everybody Clap Your Hands！ 空の向こうまで
subtitles.english: Everybody Clap Your Hands! To the other side of the sky

subtitles.original: Clap Your Hands！ 響きますように
subtitles.english: Clap Your Hands! May it resonate

subtitles.original: 手を叩こう！ 手を叩こう！
subtitles.english: Let's clap our hands! Let's clap our hands!

subtitles.original: 重なる Wave 世界を揺らせ！
subtitles.english: Overlapping waves, shake the world!

subtitles.original: Oh!
subtitles.english: Oh!

subtitles.original: Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: Woo!
subtitles.english: Woo!
1 2 3 4 5! Let's go!

subtitles.original: 終わりがあることくらい知ってるけれど
subtitles.english: I know that everything has an end

subtitles.original: でもまだまだ泳ぎ足りないイライラ
subtitles.english: But I still haven't swum enough, feeling restless

subtitles.original: Bang！ 気まぐれし Bang！ 待てレイシー
subtitles.english: Bang! Capricious Bang! Waiting for you

subtitles.original: 次元混ざり合う全て塗り替える Blue
subtitles.english: Dimensions mix together, painting everything Blue

subtitles.original: 手をあげて Clap Your Hands！ 海の向こうまで
subtitles.english: Raise your hands and Clap Your Hands! To the other side of the sea

subtitles.original: Clap Your Hands！ 届きますように
subtitles.english: Clap Your Hands! May it reach you

subtitles.original: 手を叩こう！ 手を叩こう！
subtitles.english: Let's clap our hands! Let's clap our hands!

subtitles.original: ほら一緒に Go！
subtitles.english: Come on, let's go together!

subtitles.original: Everybody Clap Your Hands！ 空の向こうまで
subtitles.english: Everybody Clap Your Hands! To the other side of the sky

subtitles.original: Clap Your Hands！ 響きますように
subtitles.english: Clap Your Hands! May it resonate

subtitles.original: 手を叩こう！ 手を叩こう！
subtitles.english: Let's clap our hands! Let's clap our hands!

subtitles.original: 光り射す 僕たちの未来
subtitles.english: The future of ours where the light shines

subtitles.original: Yeah! ハイ！ハイ！
subtitles.english: Yeah! Hai! Hai!

subtitles.original: 最高に楽しもう！
subtitles.english: Let's have the best time!

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hai! Hai!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: うーーー！ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Uhh... thank you!

subtitles.original: めっちゃ手叩いてくれてた！
subtitles.english: You guys were clapping so much!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: 一人で歌うのは...
subtitles.english: Singing alone...

subtitles.original: ...これが、このステージでここで歌うのはさ、最初で最後がいいな。
subtitles.english: ...I'd like this to be the first and last time I sing alone on this stage.

subtitles.original: 次は四人で立てるようにポルカめっちゃ頑張るから！
subtitles.english: Polka will work really hard so that next time all four of us can stand here!

subtitles.original: でも今、えっと、他のメンバーに言ってます。はい！
subtitles.english: But right now, um, I'm telling the other members. Yes!

subtitles.original: よし... ふぅ〜 よかった
subtitles.english: Alright... Phew~ that was good

subtitles.original: ありがとう
subtitles.english: Thank you

subtitles.original: ポルカのお歌のターンはここまでになっております
subtitles.english: Polka's singing turn ends here

subtitles.original: あとは、さ、コノさん
subtitles.english: Next is, well, Kono-san

subtitles.original: 作曲だよ
subtitles.english: It's composition time

subtitles.original: さ、やるよ、続き
subtitles.english: Come on, let's do the continuation

subtitles.original: ポルカも頭回ってない...
subtitles.english: Polka's head isn't spinning either...

subtitles.original: 「1周年の歌」を作ろう！
subtitles.english: Let's make a "1st Anniversary Song"!

subtitles.original: え！？なになにそれ！？ちょっと待って、待って、待って！なに！？
subtitles.english: What!? What is that!? Wait, wait, wait! What!?

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！え、なにこれ？ちょっと待って。え、なにこれ？ちょっと待って。
subtitles.english: Hi! Hi! Eh, what is this? Wait a second. Eh, what is this? Wait a second.

subtitles.original: え？なに？ちょっと待って... え？なにこれ？いつ出来たのこれ？
subtitles.english: Eh? What? Wait... Eh? What is this? When was this made?

subtitles.original: え？え？え？ちょっと... あの... え？出来上がってるやないかい！
subtitles.english: Eh? Eh? Eh? Wait... um... eh? It's already finished!

subtitles.original: あの、その過程... ああ、過程はもう先の裏で、あの、バシバシやってたのがあれが過程やったんか。
subtitles.english: Um, the process... ah, the process was what you were doing busily behind the scenes earlier? That was the process?

subtitles.original: え？ってことはもう終わって... ちょっと待って。
subtitles.english: Eh? That means it's already finished... wait a second.

subtitles.original: え？でもポルカが、待って、ポルカが追いついてない。
subtitles.english: Eh? But Polka, wait, Polka hasn't caught up.

subtitles.original: あなたの情緒にポルカが追いついていない。最初だって下がるんだろう？下がるの？
subtitles.english: Polka hasn't caught up with your pace. You said it would go down at first, right? Go down?

subtitles.original: な！え？もう上がっちゃってる...
subtitles.english: Wh-! Eh? It's already gone up...

subtitles.original: 大きくなったね、ザインくんも。すごいね、大きくなったね。
subtitles.english: You've grown big, Zain-kun. Incredible, you've grown big.

subtitles.original: あぁ、なるほどね。あの諸々の諸般の事情により、サビ作ろう。
subtitles.english: Ah, I see. Due to various circumstances, let's make the chorus.

subtitles.original: サビだけめっちゃクオリティを上げて、あとで動画で、ま、前の中... じゃ、前の部分を作ればいいじゃない？
subtitles.english: Let's just make the quality of the chorus really high, and then later we can make the, um... well, the previous part for the video, right?

subtitles.original: いいじゃない？サビだけじゃあ仕上げればいいじゃない？
subtitles.english: Isn't that fine? Let's just finish the chorus then, right?

subtitles.original: ちょっと、作詞頼んじゃなくてさ、一緒に手伝ってくれるって言ったじゃん。なんでそこで裏切るの？
subtitles.english: Wait, I didn't ask for a lyricist, you said you'd help me. Why are you betraying me there?

subtitles.original: 先さ、ほら、なんとかのアーチとか虹がうんちゃらとか。あれ？え？だって... え？
subtitles.english: Earlier, you know, something about an arch or the rainbow being whatever. Huh? Eh? But... eh?

subtitles.original: カブトムシじゃない... え？同窓... そう、そう、そう。そう、あの、なんとかの虹の光... 光が夢で... あれ？
subtitles.english: It's not a beetle... eh? Classmate... yes, yes, yes. Yes, um, the light of the rainbow or something... the light is a dream... huh?
